title: How Many Wheels?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 50 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 80L
description: How Many Wheels? is about a variety of objects that have different numbers of wheels. Familiar items are paired with ones students may not recognize to help them connect with number words. The book poses a question that encourages higher-level thinking skills.
meta: four, move, one, three, two, wheels
Use the reading strategy of making connections to life experiences and using prior knowledge to understand informational text
Initial Sound : Orally differentiate initial sounds
Consonants : Associate the letter Mm with the sound /m/

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
